description:
Data was extracted from the CCLE program in January 2017. The table contains clinical information for CCLE primary cell lines. 
More details: see https://portals.broadinstitute.org/ccle/about

fields.description: Program Name, always CCLE (Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia) in this table.
fields.name: program_name

fields.description: Project Name; frequently the same as or similar to the project disease type eg   Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia - Phase II   or   Breast Invasive Carcinoma   etc
fields.name: project_name

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; e.g. CCLE-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: The type of disease studied by the project; e.g. Sarcoma,  Breast Invasive Carcinoma,Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia, etc
fields.name: project_disease_type

fields.description: GDC unique identifier for this CCLE project and cell line
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: A case barcode assigned to the project/cell line record; same as the cell line primary name.
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: The cell line primary name, appended with a short name for the location  of the cancer; e.g. TC71_BONE, HUPT4_PANCREAS, etc.
fields.name: CCLE_name

fields.description: The cell line primary name; e.g. TC-71, NIH:OVCAR-3, etc.
fields.name: cell_line_primary_name

fields.description: Aliases for the cell line primary name
fields.name: cell_line_aliases

fields.description: The histological type of cancer; e.g.  sarcoma, neuroblastoma, etc.
fields.name: histology

fields.description: The histology subtype; e.g. squamous_cell_carcinoma, undifferentiated_carcinoma, etc.
fields.name: hist_subtype

fields.description: The primary site on the body where the cancer was found; e.g. bone, breast, pancreas, etc.
fields.name: site_primary

fields.description: The source provider of the cell line; e.g. ATCC, DSMZ, etc.
fields.name: source
